arStrings.szText: Increase the Critical Strike Damage of {c_important}Meteor{/c_important} and {c_important}Fireball{/c_important} by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}. Double this bonus against {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c} targets.
Increase the Critical Strike Damage of {c_important}Meteor{/c_important} and {c_important}Fireball{/c_important} by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}.
